original_text: When they had made an end of dividing the land for inheritance by their coasts, the children of Israel gave an inheritance to Joshua the son of Nun among them:
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 그들의 경계를 따라서 기업의 땅 나누기를 마치고 자기들 중에서 눈의 아들 여호수아에게 기업을 주었으니

sentences.original_text: When they had made an end of dividing the land
the children of Israel gave an inheritance
to Joshua the son of Nun
